LightningComponentBundle.description: A sortable table component displaying product information with columns for Product Name, Price, Category, and Stock Status.

property.name: hideHeader
property.label: Hide Table Header
property.description: If true, hides the table header

property.name: showRowHover
property.label: Show Row Hover Effect
property.description: If true, shows a hover effect on table rows

property.name: showStripedRows
property.label: Show Striped Rows
property.description: If true, displays alternating row colors
